mapper.select: SELECT userName, password, userId, email, role, userState, phone, headPhoto, deptId, registerDate, permissionId, sign FROM user WHERE userId IN ( SELECT userId FROM usergroup WHERE groupId = #{groupId} )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chatlog( username, avatar, id, type, content, cid, mine, fromid, timestamp, recipientId, status ) VALUES( #{message.username}, #{message.avatar}, #{message.id}, #{message.type}, #{message.content}, #{message.cid}, #{message.mine}, #{message.fromid}, #{message.timestamp}, #{message.recipientId}, #{statusCode} )
mapper.select: SELECT username, avatar, id, type, content, cid, mine, fromid, timestamp, recipientId FROM chatlog WHERE recipientId = #{recipientId} AND status = #{statusCode}; UPDATE chatlog SET status = 1 WHERE recipientId = #{recipientId} AND status = #{statusCode};
